comment: I have her for lecture and lab, she is very helpful. She answer ques

I did not pass due to personal reasons however she gave so much extra credit. Your grade can go up a whole letter grade from those alone. The homework and quizzes are online. Group assignments are worth 20 points each but very easy. I recommend going to class because she goes over the important slides only that will help you succeed on the test.

She was a great professor. she gave out a lot of extra credit that's very beneficial for your grade at the end of the year. i struggled with every test because i waited last minute to study and only passed 1 exam and still finished with a B. make sure you study so you are able to get the grade you desire. Her exams are straight forward if you study

Amazing lab professor. She will answer any questions you have and even extends the lab assignment dates in certain occasions. She talks very low tho, I would def try to sit anywhere near her to listen better. Gives out extra credit and lab reviews for both midterm and final. I totally recommend her for lab! READ THE MANUAL SO YOU'RE NOT LOST!:)

The best professor I've ever had at Kennesaw State University. She's amazing and I would 100% recommend her to anyone taking microbiology. I truly admire her teaching and I've genuinely learned so much in this subject because of her. She also gives so many opportunities to bump your grade up and you can tell she truly cares for her students.

One of the best lecturers I have had at KSU. She gives many in-class assignments that can help boost your grade as well as bonus points. I took her for both lecture and lab and she was great in both. For lab she gives good practice reviews that helped me prepare for the lab practicals. She made microbiology so interesting and enjoyable.

I have her for Micro lecture and lab, she is very helpful, walk around to ensure that we are doing the lab correctly. In the lecture, she explains in detail, using the PowerPoints. She reply fast to emails.
I would say she is not the nicest.

Very good professor, gives extra credit during lectures, long lectures, attendance doesn't matter.  4 exams and a final, homework assignments, quizzes, case studies, and group activities make up your grade. Highly recommend to those taking microbiology.

she is super chill. responds to emails really quickly. she explains all of the labs to you. she'll help you if you if you ask her during lab. lots of extra credit opportunities. you'll easily pass with an A if you take her.
She is very helpful and understanding, her tests are mainly from what she focused on during the lectures, Lot of opportunities for extra credits.
Such a sweetheart. Makes herself super available for help while completing labs. If you ask for help or for the answer to something, she's super straightforward and nice about it.
I am taking her Micro 2260 Lab. She helps a lot, moves around to explain what you should do with the lab. She answers any question in details. The lab material is not easy, needs a lot of reading.

Really doesn't explain anything when it comes to lab. She is also a little difficult to understand so stand close to her if you can. IS inconsistent with grading. My lab partner and I would put the same stuff and receive different grades. Lab is standardized so everyone gets the same tests so if you need to take her you will be fine.

WAY too much extra credit. I'm sorry, I'm someone who believes A's should be reserved for those who deserve them, not EVERYONE. 30% of the points can be replaced with extra credit, ensuring everyone gets an A for existing. Annoying for those who want to stand out with their work ethic and A's.

Easily one of the nicest professors. Lectures are long and a lot of content but that's just the nature of the subject. She does a great job of making things easy to understand & tells you what's on the exams in class. Don't stress if you don't do well on exams because she gives tons of extra credit & all the hw and quizzes can push your grade up.

Professor Jabri is a good professor. She does give a lot of extra credit. Attendance is not necessary but that's where she gives the extra credit so definitely go to class. Class is also where she will tell you what slides will be on the test. The PowerPoints are extremely long and lectures are kind of boring though.

I took her for lab and lecture. For lab, she was very helpful. For lecture, class was not mandatory but she would give extra credit each time you went. Prepare to teach yourself in this class, the tests are very specific. However, I did not do great on the tests but was able to get a B because of the other assignments.
Took her for microbiology lab. The lab was not awful, but she can be hard to understand sometimes with her accent. She was super sweet though and always willing to help.

I took her lab for BIOL 1107. She's really nice and lenient. If I did not understand what to do for the lab she wouldn't hesitate to explain. She gives good feedback for posters and prepared us before exams and practicums. She is an easy grader, would 100% take again.

I took Professor Jabri for BIOL2660L  and she was SO NICE. Always explained things twice in case you missed it the first time, made sure you got out at a decent time, went over the lab report before you turned it in and told you what to study for the practicum.
Difficult course. She use powerpointe for lectures. Reading the lecture notes was helpful for the exams. She is nice and easy. I recommend her
I took the class as a core requirement for degree. She is knowledgeable and kind. Lot of homework, quizzes. Exams are not easy, but she provide an exam review. She is easy grader
She is nice and easy to talk to. She respond to emails fast, give lot of work that really helped. She gives exam review and lab quiz review. Very knowledgable. I highly recommend her.

She is very knowledgable in her work. Gives a lot of extra credit, which is helpful. what I like about her is that she isn't tough on her grading exams and lab quizzes. lectures are long, but are useful. Attendance is mandatory. I would definitely have her as a professor again.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--Amazing lectures--EXTRA CREDIT

comment: This professor clearly has a strong language barrier with her students. Her tests, quizzes, emails, and even lectures are extremely difficult to understand. The one good thing that I can say about her is that she basically grades everything (except tests) for completion, even her lab quizzes. If you actually want to learn Env Sci, do not take her.
